attributes.action: I WOULD LIKE TO START A PETITON TO START ARTICLE 50 ,TO CUT THE CHAINS TO THE EU
attributes.additional_details:
The people like myself was pushed into the EU through a promise of a common market , We have been lied to for forty years , those 20 year olds today ,do you want 40 more years of what we have just had and its getting worse .Were will you be in forty years time in the EU , 
There will be no mobiles ,no computers for personal use , restrickens on all your travel there may even be CURFEWS , Ask your parents what was it like in the 60,s And they will say we had fun ,plenty of work ,plenty of cash.
attributes.background: Without ARTICLE 50 we in this country are held back in a time warp locked into the EU , Whether we voted out or not , with ARTCLE 50 we can cut the chains that hold the UK back .
